content: जुष्ट {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [जुष्-कर्मणि क्त] {@--1@} Pleased, gratified. {@--2@} Practised, resorted to, visited, suffered &c.; <ls>Bg. 2. 2.</ls> {@--3@} Furnished or endowed with, possessed of. {@--4@} Liked loved, agreeable. {@--5@} Served, worshipped. {@--6@} Propitious, favourable. {@--7@} Shared, partaken in; <ls>U. 6. 40.</ls> --ष्टं The remnants of meal (उच्छिष्ट).
